title: Free People’s New Arrivals Section Is Full Of Fall-Ready Outfits
description: We know our readers love a good Free People find. So do our editors, who are always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new products to shop at the retailer. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention — and money.Now that cooler weather is here, it’s a great time to take stock of your closet. Do you need a new fall date dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a cozy cardigan? Free People has newness that fits the bill from fan-favorite collections like FP Movement, We The Free, and Free-est to suit any vibe you’re going for this autumn. So, without further ado,  here are the 18 best things to buy at Free People from its new arrivals section.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Summer IntroWe know our readers love a good Free People find... as do our editors. We’re always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new Free People products to shop. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention and money.And now that summer is officially here, it’s a great time to take a deep dive into your closet to see what you need to re-stock. Do you need a new flowy dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a denim jacket for festival season? Free People has fresh styles that fit the bill.You’ll find many products coming from Free People’s fan-favorite collections like FP Movement, We The Free, and Free-est to suit any vibe you’re going for this summer. So without further ado, from clothing to accessories, here are the 15 best things to buy at Free People from its new arrivals section.FP Movement Quilted Carryall BagFP Movement's carryall bag is perhaps the collection's most beloved piece.  This season, you can cart it up in a vibrant cobalt blue.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Carryall Bag, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Classic Striped Oversized CrewneckWe love a preppy striped crewneck for fall.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Classic Striped Oversized Crewneck, $, available at Free PeopleTempest SetDate night just got a little bit hotter with this set.Shop Free PeopleFree People Tempest Set, $, available at Free PeopleLevi's Low Loose JeansLow-rise jeans are making a comeback, and we're not upset.Shop Free PeopleLevi's Low Loose Jeans, $, available at Free PeopleIntentionally Blank Tied With A Bow Ballet FlatsBallet flats are the It Shoe of the year, we can't help but obsess over this velvet version.Shop Free PeopleIntentionally Blank Tied With A Bow Ballet Flats, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Queen Of Hearts ThermalLean into cottagecore this fall with this Peter Pan-collared thermal.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Queen Of Hearts Thermal, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Pippa Packable Puffer JacketStay warm in an R29 editor favorite this fall in a darling blueberry color.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Pippa Packable Puffer Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleFP One Ember Printed Midi SkirtKeep it breezy this fall with this polka-dotted cutie.Shop Free PeopleFP One Ember Printed Midi Skirt, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hit The Slopes SalopetteWinter is coming, and we’re ready thanks to this super cute and cozy navy salopette.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Hit The Slopes Salopette, $, available at Free PeopleEllie Scarf Wrap KimonoWhat's better than a warm scarf on a chilly fall day? A scarf with a slouchy cape, that’s what.Shop Free PeopleFree People Ellie Scarf Wrap Kimono, $, available at Free PeopleKiki Kitten Heel BootsNeed a more dressed-up shoe that won't leave your dogs frozen? Try these sleek kitten-heeled boots.Shop Free PeopleFP Collection Kiki Kitten Heel Boots, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Cozy In This CardiCardigans and fall just go together. Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Cozy In This Cardi, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Good Karma OnesieLayer up with this cool blue onesie as the weather cools down.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Good Karma Onesie, $, available at Free PeopleUnderstated Leather Perfect Micro Mini SkirtThis leather skirt brings all the rock'n'roll we need this fall.Shop Free PeopleUnderstated Leather Leather Perfect Micro Mini Skirt, $, available at Free PeopleHutch The Ridge DressDid someone say fall wedding guest dress? Shop Free PeopleHutch The Ridge Dress, $, available at Free PeopleIntimately From Me To You Long SleeveWe can't wait to wear this lacy number on a girls' night out or a semi-spicy date with some jeans and boots.Shop Free PeopleIntimately v, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Swing of Things SkortsieFeel flirty in this skortsie (a.k.a. a workout dress with built-in shorts and bra) while working up a sweat.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Swing of Things Skortsie, $, available at Free PeopleBeloved Waffle Knit Ankle SocksComplete every outfit with these adorable lacy waffle knit socks.Shop Free PeopleFree People Beloved Waffle Knit Ankle Socks, $, available at Free PeopleHit The Slopes Fleece JacketHey, Hit The Slopes Fleece fans — a new diva has entered the building, and she’s sapphire blue.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Hit The Slopes Fleece Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleAmeena Sweater Skort SetThis blush pink skort and sweater set is the perfect combination of chic and cozy.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Ameena Sweater Skort Set, $, available at Free PeopleFringe Out Vegan Suede JacketA little fringe goes a long way in leveling up your jacket's wow factor.Shop Free PeopleFree People Fringe Out Vegan Suede Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleBerry Kiss Mini DressWe can't wait to plan a date night just to wear this adorable dress — even if it means taking ourselves out on the town.Shop Free PeopleFree People Berry Kiss Mini Dress, $, available at Free PeopleOpal Swing Printed Denim JacketWe’re saying "heck yes" to this denim leopard-print jacket.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Opal Swing Printed Denim Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleMania Bow FlatsWe knew you were looking for a cute new pair of under-$100 ballet flats to add to your collection.Shop Free PeopleFP Collection Mania Bow Flats, $, available at Free PeopleFreya Maxi DressWe loved the Freya Maxi Dress during the summer, and we adore this raspberry jewel-tone version for fall.Shop Free PeopleFree People Freya Maxi Dress, $, available at Free PeopleHot Shot Crossover SetAnother one of your favorite lounge sets from FP Movement is back, this time in a cool sage color.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Crossover Set, $, available at Free PeopleRolla’s Sailor JeansA good pair of denim is never a bad idea. We love this classic pair of Sailor Jeans from Rolla's.Shop Rolla's At Free PeopleRolla's Sailor Jeans, $, available at Free PeopleLace Lover BlouseIf you're looking to spice up your work wardrobe, try adding a lace-trimmed blouse for a delicate touch.Shop Free PeopleFree People Lace Lover Blouse, $, available at Free PeopleSweet Nothing CardiA good cardigan goes a long way during the colder months.Shop Free PeopleFree People Sweet Nothing Cardi, $, available at Free PeopleJeffrey Campbell Lilly Buckle Slingback FlatsThese cherry red flats bring a lil rock'n'roll and a whole lot of attitude — the perfect addition to any outfit, if you ask us.Shop Jeffrey Campbell At Free PeopleJeffrey Campbell Lilly Buckle Slingback Flats, $, available at Free PeopleOnda Drop-Waist Long-Sleeve MiniA long-sleeved drop-waist dress is too cute for us to pass up.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Onda Drop-Waist Long-Sleeve Mini, $, available at Free PeopleHigh Time Velvet Kick Flare PantsReal suede is expensive, and leather may not be your vibe — so, consider these cute-as-a-button pink velvet pants.Shop Free PeopleFree People High Time Velvet Kick Flare Pants, $, available at Free PeopleAnders SetWhat's better than a boho-chic set? A boho-chic set that looks just as cute together as it does when each piece is worn individually.Shop Free PeopleFree People Anders Set, $, available at Free PeopleLili Linen CardiLinen isn't just for the summer — especially when it's in the form of a cardigan.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Lili Linen Cardi, $, available at Free PeopleGood Karma BodysuitEver tried working out in a bodysuit? Us neither, but we'll definitely start with the Good Karma Bodysuit.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Good Karma Bodysuit, $, available at Free PeopleJayde Flare JeansFlare jeans are in — time to hop on the trend.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Jayde Flare Jeans, $, available at Free PeopleBow Babe BlouseWe cannot think of a more perfect work blouse than this bow-adorned balloon-sleeved style with the most adorable collar.Shop Free PeopleFree People Bow Babe Blouse, $, available at Free PeopleEsme Mini DressDenim and fall go hand in hand. Especially in the form of this chic belted button-up denim dress.Shop Free PeopleFree People Esme Mini Dress, $, available at Free PeopleFree Reign Vegan ShortsThis in-between summer and fall weather isn't quite right for corduroy pants, but linen pants don't cut it either. The solution: vegan leather shorts. These are the perfect transitional weather bottoms that can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Free Reign Vegan Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleLong Time Love TopJust imagine: this shirt, a cute pleated skirt, tall boots with lacy knee-high stockings, and dainty accessories. It’s the perfect date outfit for a fall afternoon.Shop Free PeopleFree People Long Time Love Top, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement x On Cloudnova Form 2 SneakersWe love these cutesy sneakers from the new FP Movement x On collaboration — especially the adorable floral detail inside the shoe — and can't wait to put them on for a perfect fall afternoon long run. Shop FP MovementFP Movement x On Cloudnova Form 2 Sneakers, $, available at Free PeopleGirl Meets Boy Plaid ShirtA good vintage-looking plaid shirt is a fall must-have. Wear it over a tank top and shorts during the transitional weather or on its own with a pair of jeans as the temperature drops.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Girl Meets Boy Plaid Shirt, $, available at Free PeopleLevi's Baggy Dad JortsIf you haven't hopped on the denim jorts trend, now is the perfect time to try it out. Try pairing them with a cropped baby tee or a nice lacy blouse.Shop Levi's At Free PeopleLevi's Baggy Dad Jorts, $, available at Free PeopleGood Luck Cord OverallsName something more fall-coded than corded barrel-leg overalls, I'll wait. This pair is great for an easy yet cute throw-on-and-go look.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Good Luck Cord Overalls, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hit The Slopes Printed PulloverThe R29 editor-loved Hit The Slopes pullover is back — and cuter than ever in new prints! Shop FP MovementFP Movement Hit The Slopes Printed Pullover, $, available at Free PeopleCheetah CardiCheetah print is in this season, and this slouchy-fit cardigan might just become your fall go-to for when you need an extra layer.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Cheetah Cardi, $, available at Free PeopleElliatt Gardenia GownDid someone say fall wedding guest dress? While florals are usually a spring thing, this bloom-covered dress just works.Shop Elliatt At Free PeopleELLIATT Gardenia Gown, $, available at Free PeopleLady Lux Layering TopAnother R29 editor-endorsed top is back in some cute new colors. We can't wait to wear this on a girls' night out or a semi-spicy date with some jeans and boots.Shop Free PeopleIntimately Lady Lux Layering Top, $, available at Free PeopleDamson Madder Dakota Bow DressThe perfect fall dress doesn't exist... This bow-adorned plaid cutie just proved us wrong.Shop Damson Madder At Free PeopleDamson Madder Dakota Bow Dress, $, available at Free PeopleTaylor HenleyA good henley tee is solid choice for a casual and cool fall look — especially with these delicate embroidery details along the seams.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Taylor Henley, $, available at Free PeopleBinx SweaterThis slouchy chic backless knit is made for “sweater weather” days.Shop Free PeopleFree People Binx Sweater, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Pleats And Thank You SkortA cute new piece of activewear is always a great reason to get outside for some fall athletic activities. We're thinking of wearing this to the courts for some outdoor tennis practice.Shop FP MovementFP Movement Pleats And Thank You Skort, $, available at Free PeopleSpell Ocean GownWe can’t help but want this romantic maxi dress in all six colors — just look at that lace and patterned silky fabric!Shop Free PeopleSpell Ocean Gown, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Swing of Things SkortsieHeat up the courts in this red hot skortsie, which is as functional as it is fashionable. Outfitted with built-in shorts, a scoop neckline and a built-in bra, this skortsie offers the best of both worlds, so you’ll feel feminine while showing off your athletic prowess.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Swing of Things Skortsie, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Tilly VestFree People has great wardrobe classics, and the butter yellow Tilly Vest that just dropped is no exception.Shop Free PeopleFree People Tilly Vest, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Fast Break SetWith FP Movement’s bestseller coordinated set in lavender, there’s no need to worry about mismatching your top and bottom — the Fast Break Set does all the work for you.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Fast Break Set, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Maxamillion Charm NecklaceThe 2000s are calling and they want their charm necklaces back, but this is a Y2k trend that we’re going to keep.Shop Free PeopleFree People Maxamillion Charm Necklace, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Milan MidiStrapless dresses are in this year. The Milan Midi’s combination of this corset-inspired bodice and a flowy skirt is stunning in baby blue.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Milan Midi, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Sahara Micro Denim ShortsForget about apple-bottom jeans; it’s time for hot shorts to make an appearance.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Sahara Micro Denim Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Fruity Frolic Ankle SocksWe’d never turn down a good pair of fruit socks. Just look at these lemon-adorned socks, which will add a cheeky detail to your outfit.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Fruity Frolic Ankle Socks, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Day To Day Solid BoxersIf you haven’t yet hopped on the boxers trend, now is the time with these fresh cornflower blue ones.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Day To Day Solid Boxers, $, available at Free PeopleFP One Lausanne SlipIf you couldn’t tell, we are all over trendy romantic styles this summer. This dainty number is just one of the six dreamy colors of this gauzy mini dress. We love how it can be layered or worn alone.Shop Free PeopleFP One Lausanne Slip, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Nostalgia Ultra-ShortallsWhat looks as cute as a denim dress but is as comfortable as denim shorts? Denim shortalls!Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Nostalgia Ultra-Shortalls, $, available at Free PeopleIntimately Only You TankSummer is heating up, and so are Free People’s latest drops. We love this flirty tank with ribbon and lace trim. Talk about a coquette-girl summer.Shop Free PeopleIntimately Only You Tank, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Mindy Backless MidiWe support knits for the season — especially in the form of this slim-fit backless midi dress. Whether you just got off the beach or you want to look like it, throw this dress on for an easy chic fit.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Mindy Backless Midi, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Good Luck Barrel OverallsSometimes it’s nice to just slip on a crop top and a pair of overalls — or forgot the crop top, and just wear the overalls for a nice one-and-done kind of day.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Good Luck Barrel Overalls, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Light As Air Run ShortsFP Movement just dropped these bright white shorts, and we are here for it. The shorts are designed with sweat-wicking properties, a reinforced mesh lining, and compressive fabric, so you only have to worry about getting that ball over the net. Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Light As Air Run Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Wishing Well Linen SetEvery summer Free People comes out with gorgeous linen pieces perfect for surviving the hot weather, and every summer we love each of the drops — including this chic tie-front top with matching shorts.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Wishing Well Linen Set, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Righteous RunsieFP Movement's bestselling workout onesie has been updated with new colorways, like this sweet baby blue, that'll motivate you to start moving.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Righteous Runsie, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Timko OnesieEveryone has lazy days and that's what onesies are made for. Throw on this breezy cotton blend barrel leg onesie on the days that you just can't. Plus we love the easy button closure and front and back pockets.Shop Free PeopleFree People Timko Onesie, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Crossover SetIt's been about a year since the release of the Barbie movie and Barbiecore, but we're still not over it. We love this newly dropped bubblegum pink version of the Hot Shot Crossover Set.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Crossover Set, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Forevermore TankWhat do you get when you combine delicate lace with romantic silhouettes? This gorgeous periwinkle tank! We can't wait to wear this ruffle-trimmed top to soften our outfit.Shop Free PeopleFree People Forevermore Tank, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Onda Drop-Waist Tube MidiLook absolutely electric in this bright lime green drop-waist dress. The romantic a-line skirt and tube-style bodice will have you feeling like a lover girl all summer long whether you pair it with sneakers or softer ballet flats.Shop Free PeopleFree-est Corfu Tube SetIf you can't make a trip to Greece this summer, you can at least feel like it in this flowy new Corfu Tube set in cream. The dreamy ruffle trim and billowy silhouette crafted of cotton poplin will keep you looking and feeling cool.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Corfu Tube Set, $, available at Free PeopleFP One Raya Bandana TopBoho chic is always in style for us, and Free People's iteration of the bandana top is perfection. If you need us, we will be staying colorful, breezy, and cool in this pull-on style bandana top.Shop Free PeopleFP One Raya Bandana Top, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Surplus Shine Carryall BagAnd another one... Free People continues to knock it out of the park with not only great clothing, but best-selling bags. While this is similar to the much-loved Quilted Carry-All, this version has something that makes it sparkle above — it's shiny!Shop Free PeopleFree People Surplus Shine Carryall Bag, $, available at Free PeopleFP One Lausanne SlipIf you couldn't tell, we are all over trendy romantic styles this summer. This dainty-smocked lilac number is just one of five dreamy colors of this gauzy mini dress. We love how it can be layered or worn alone.Shop Free PeopleFP One Lausanne Slip, $, available at Free PeopleIntimately Cloud Nine Lounge ShirtWhoever said button-ups are only for the boys clearly never saw the Cloud Nine Lounge Shirt. Pop this over a swimsuit or crop top, or even wear it solo — this relaxed-fit seersucker button-down is effortlessly cool. Shop Free PeopleIntimately Cloud Nine Lounge Shirt, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Mindy Sweater MidiButter yellow is here to stay, at least for this summer and we love the brightness it brings to our closets. Throw this flattering backless knit midi over a swimsuit post-beach or a pair of strappy heels for a hot date night look.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Mindy Sweater Midi, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est My Little Micro Mini Cotton-Linen SkortWe love this combination of airy cotton and linen that make this skort perfect for those hot summer days — and how cute is this baby pink!Shop Free Peoplefree-est My Little Micro Mini Cotton-Linen Skort, $, available at Free PeopleCircus By Sam Edelman Zuri Ballet FlatsIf loving leopard print is wrong, we don't want to be right. These printed ballet flats add a little oomph to any outfit. Shop Free PeopleCircus by Sam Edelman Zuri Ballet Flats, $, available at Free PeopleAgolde Risha ShortsCapri shorts are trending again, and we might as well embrace it. We love this classic denim color from Agolde with a longer inseam for maximum comfort.Shop Free PeopleAgolde Risha Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Hadlee MaxiFree People just dropped this effortless, flowy maxi dress, and we can't help but want it in all three colors. Boho dresses are trending, and we think this one is worth carting up.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Hadlee Maxi, $, available at Free PeopleFree People All The Ways TopThis top-rated cropped blouse is now available in a cheery mint green. From the embroidery lace and ruffle trim to the fabric buttons, this top is the ultimate coquette style for spring.Shop Free PeopleFree People All The Ways Top, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Ridley Pull-On Barrel JeansLooking to take on the barrel-leg jean trend this season? Consider these top-rated Free People jeans, which are now available in an elevated smokey grey wash.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Ridley Pull-On Barrel Jeans, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted CarryallFP Movement's carryall bag is perhaps the collection's most beloved and iconic style. And now you can cart it up in a vibrant tangerine.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Carryall, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Fringe Out Denim JacketWhether Beyoncé's upcoming Cowboy Carter album has influenced you to take on Western fashion, or you're looking for a layering piece for festival season, this denim fringe jacket is calling our names.Shop Free PeopleFree People Fringe Out Denim Jacket, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est For The Moment MiniCart up this popular Free People babydoll mini dress in a new khaki color to serve as a versatile wardrobe staple this spring.Shop Free Peoplefree-est For The Moment Mini, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Hot Shot Skort SetWhether you're into the preppy tenniscore trend (see: Zendaya's upcoming movie Challengers) or you're actually a tennis girl, this sleek skort set will be your next best purchase.Shop Free PeopleFree People Hot Shot Skort Set, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Margarita JumpsuitWe personally love a jumpsuit moment for a one-and-done look, and this Free People style is the next cool-girl one-piece we want.Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Margarita Jumpsuit, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Caught In The Moment Maxi SkirtFree People just released their Free-est textured maxi skirt in a bright yellow that has us craving sunshine and lemonade. Shop Free Peoplefree-est Caught In The Moment Maxi Skirt, $, available at Free PeopleFree People West Side Studded SlingR29 affiliate writer Esther Newman shouted out this sling bag on our Free People editor spring picks roundup. And now the leather bag is available in several more neutral and vibrant colorways.Shop Free PeopleFree People West Side Studded Sling, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Ava VestNo, sweater vests are not just for winter. Wear this knitted vest under a jacket, over a long sleeve, or on its own depending on the weather. Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Ava Vest, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Emmers Linen MidiLooking for a slip dress for date night? A casual wedding guest dress? Or a chic swim coverup? This linen midi dress, now available in several colors, is versatile enough for it all.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Emmers Linen Midi, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Effie Denim Pocket ShortsSomething about paperbag-waist bottoms screams youthful, warm-weather style. These new denim shorts are somehow equally adorable and utilitarian, allowing you to style them for different vibes and occasions. Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Effie Denim Pocket Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Righteous RunsieFP Movement's bestselling workout onesie has been updated with new colorways, like this neon pink as well a cobalt blue, that'll make you motivated to start moving.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Righteous Runsie, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Santa Luz MaxiIf you're in the market for a super flowy and ethereal tiered dress, you'll love this new style. The textured and ruffle-forward maxi is delicate and features an open back with adjustable ties. Pair it with sandals and wear your dress seaside as it billows in the breeze.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Santa Luz Maxi, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Tighten Up Low-Back TankGone are the day of boring workout clothes. In are the days of unique and confident-boosting activewear. This top has a trendy square neckline and a sexy low back just for that. The ribbed tank top is also formfitting yet stretchy, ensuring you'll be able to comfortably move in every direction while exercising. Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Tighten Up Low-Back Tank, $, available at Free PeopleFP Collection Eden Double Stack EspadrillesPlatform shoes are trending, so why not go bold with a tried-and-true style that you can actually wear every day? Here's where we introduce you to these easy, breezy stacked espadrilles. Slip into the suede braided shoes for when you want a little height without a heel.Shop Free PeopleFP Collection Eden Double Stack Espadrilles, $, available at Free PeopleWe The Free Ivy Mid-Rise ShortsIt's officially denim shorts season, and we're loving these heritage-inspired cut-offs from Free People. They're giving "cool girl" with the slightly-oversized, relaxed silhouette and the frayed hems. And if you're not into light-wash denim, this style is also available in white, black, and darker shades. Shop Free PeopleWe The Free Ivy Mid-Rise Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Tulip SetA chic two-piece matching set under $100? Sign us up. You won't even have to think twice about what you're wearing to your next barbecue with this textured cotton duo. The top's open back is super on-trend, and the pants' cropped fit is just as fresh and perfect for the summer heat.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Tulip Set, $, available at Free PeopleMare Perpetua Twist One-Piece SwimsuitLow-back one-piece swimsuits are a perpetual summer favorite, and we're here for this particular style. This skin-baring swimsuit has a plunging neckline, keyhole back, high-cut legs, and cheeky coverage. Wear it for your next dip or wear it as a bodysuit with your favorite bottoms.Shop Free PeopleMare Perpetua Twist One-Piece Swimsuit, $, available at Free PeopleHOKA Clifton 9 SneakersIn addition to its own boho-chic wares, FP sells a selection of popular brands that fit into the brand's laid-back and playful aesthetic. If you're a runner (or a walker) run to checkout with Hoka's latest brightly colored sneakers in your cart. Beyond their cheery colors, they're cushioned, lightweight, and breathable, which is all music to our ears, especially for summer strolls.Shop Free PeopleHoka Clifton 9 Sneakers, $, available at Free PeopleSupergoop! Unseen Sunscreen Body SPF 40Yes, the R29 editors were just as excited about the Supergoop! body sunscreen launch as you were. And now, Free People is selling the cult-favorite "unseen" formula. Slather on this silky SPF and enjoy your summer.Shop Free PeopleSupergoop! Unseen Sunscreen Body SPF 40, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Simply Smitten Maxi SkirtWe're manifesting Mamma Mia 3 and we're doing that by dancing in Greek vacation-appropriate maxi skirts.Shop Free Peoplefree-est Simply Smitten Maxi Skirt, $, available at Free PeopleFP Collection Hudson Sling BagWe found the perfect mini crossbody bag for your park picnics and airplane travels. It surprisingly has plenty of pockets and slots, and is unsurprisingly super cute with a suede finish. Adjust the strap to your perfect fit, throw in your keys, chapstick, or passport, and be on your way.Shop Free PeopleFP Collection Hudson Sling Bag, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est City Sleek One-PieceFor another effortlessly put-together outfit, go for a loose-fitting jumpsuit. This one, perfectly modeled by Candace Swanepoel, features a bustier seam-detail top and billowing harem pants so you'll be covered and cool. The one-piece also has a drawstring waistband for extra comfort. Pair it with strappy sandals, chunky espadrilles, or sporty sneakers.Shop Free Peoplefree-est City Sleek One-Piece, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Mini DressTennis-core and workout dresses are having their moments right now. Whether you want one for pickleball or hot girl walks, this Free People one is available in a few fresh summer-ready colorways. Be comfortable no matter your activity level knowing that you've essentially got mini skort coverage.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Mini Dress, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Kerry TankThis delicate, lace-adorned top is perfect if you want to take on the everlasting cottagecore trend in a more subtle manner. The front has tiny buttons for a mock-corset feel and the back straps feature dainty bow ties. Dress it down with a pair of denim shorts, or dress it up with an equally whimsical midi skirt.Shop Free PeopleFree People Kerry Tank, $, available at Free PeopleKosas Glow I.V. Vitamin-Infused Skin EnhancerYou've definitely heard about Kosas at this point, but you may not have heard about its new skin enhancer, which is essentially a nutrient-rich formula with a tinted pearly finish that can be worn with or without additional foundation. So is it skincare? Is it a skin tint? Is it highlighter? Yes to everything! Free People currently has the product available in eight bronzy shades.Shop Free PeopleKosas Glow I.V. Vitamin-Infused Skin Enhancer, $, available at Free PeopleFree-est Orchid Convertible Low-Back MiniThis nifty knit mini dress can be worn an endless amount of ways. Wrap the thick straps at the shoulders and waist in a multitude of directions and styles for a new look every single time you wear it. Shop Free Peoplefree-est Orchid Convertible Low-Back Mini, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement ​​Mesmerize Me Solid PantsIf you're looking for a pair of pants that you can wear for from a café to a long hike then to a supermarket followed by a gym workout, these are the ones for you. The cargo-style pants are sporty, chic, and lightweight. The relaxed fit and snap-button waist are also some extra nice perks. Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Mesmerize Me Solid Pants, $, available at Free PeopleVacation by Vacation Eau de ToiletteYou may or may not have heard about the SPF brand Vacation, but it sells one of Senior Travel Writer Venus Wong's favorite sunscreens. She said it smells like a banana split in the best way possible, and now you can smell like one through Vacation's perfume. According to the brand, it also has notes of coconut, pool water, and all other vacation-adjacent scents.Shop Free PeopleVacation Vacation Eau de Toilette, $, available at Free PeopleFree People Teeny Tiny Mega Stud Earring SetThese new Free People stud earrings are a steel, with a set containing 18 or so styles. Choose between a bunch of different themes, metals, and color palettes to find the perfect set for your new go-to summer jewelry collection.Shop Free PeopleFree People Teeny Tiny Mega Stud Earring Set, $, available at Free PeopleLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?16 Free People Spring Items Editors Are Carting UpAnthropologie Spring Dresses, Ranked By ReviewersThe Target X DVF Collab Will Have You Spring-Ready
author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: We've compiled the best new arrivals from Free People so you can be fall-ready with new dresses, trendy denim, activewear sets, and outerwear.
text: Photo: Courtesy of Free People.We know our readers love a good Free People find. So do our editors, who are always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new products to shop at the retailer. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention — and money.Now that cooler weather is here, it’s a great time to take stock of your closet. Do you need a new fall date dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a cozy cardigan? Photo: Courtesy of Free People.

We know our readers love a good Free People find. So do our editors, who are always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new products to shop at the retailer. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention — and money.

Now that cooler weather is here, it’s a great time to take stock of your closet. Do you need a new fall date dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a cozy cardigan? Free People has newness that fits the bill from fan-favorite collections like FP Movement, We The Free, and Free-est to suit any vibe you’re going for this autumn. So, without further ado,  here are the 18 best things to buy at Free People from its new arrivals section.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
